item.title: Big Tech Stocks Are Falling but That Doesn’t Mean There’s an AI Bubble
item.description: The stock selloff doesn’t justify claims of another internet bubble.

item.title: Concerned You Don’t Spend Enough Time With Your Kids? Science Says Quality Beats Quantity
item.description: If you want to raise emotionally healthy kids, research shows how–not how long–you spend time with them matters more.

item.title: A Ton of Data Suggests People Are Getting Less Weird. Should We Worry?
item.description: A psychologist says our culture is growing more risk averse and less weird. Can entrepreneurs help us escape the blandness?
